title: Becoming: My Personal Memoirs
description: Becoming is all about living, loving, regretting, learning and growing. The poetry is heartfelt, tear-jerking, and thought-provoking! This book is for any poetry lover and anyone who seeks the words to express the emotional undercurrents of life. Containing some of Lacresha Hayes' most popular prose, Becoming is sure to give readers hours of pleasure and become a frequent nightstand companion.
author: Lacresha Hayes
